documents.title: HFCA - CCM Recipes
documents.content: 1,TRUE,"Duplicate TEMPLATE, update name of tab and change cell A1 to the new week" 2,TRUE,Delete any unused rows down the bottom 3,TRUE,"Open the Product Calendar for product-specific launches (Please note: any menu updates that will require manipulation to the sheet (labels, tags, new concepts, red flags, questions in the thread that impact upload etc.))" 4,TRUE,Check concept running for 1020 and modify under labels using dropdown 5,TRUE,"Check concept running for 1045, 1064-1066, 1082-1083 and manually enter it in the cell provided in row 3" 6,TRUE,Override the Label and Recipe Card label of slot 1044 is running a specific Discovery (check the product calendar) 7,TRUE,"Open Slack and the #hfc_weekly_menuplanning sheet, find the post for the week you are working on" 8,TRUE,"Slot 1038 fluctuates being Veggie and not. If MP have identified it as Veggie in the slack message, then manually add the Veggie tag" 9,TRUE,Update weekly Widgets 10,TRUE,"Using PM logic, select widget recipes (+ mods!)" 11,TRUE,Select Test Kitchen and Discovery Label from dropdowns 12,FALSE,"Check the ""None"" and ""Uncategorized"" columns and update CPS where information is missing. You must do this for any future versions of the recipe as well" 13,-,You need to do this the week before menu upload so that it is ready for HC the following week 14,-,"Once HC have uploaded the menu week into CCM and before the menu is activated, you need to check each slot to ensure all the tags and labels have been added. Checkmark columns S & T during intital and final upload to verify the checks have been complete" 15,-,"When QA-ing the activated menu on live, if you spot any missing tags on the MOD counterparts (eg. Family Friendly, Spicy, Optional Spice) then you must add them to this sheet manually to ensure they will be added at T-2" ,, '''''''''',, Wk.,Checklist, W02+,FALSE,Remove balanced labels from 1085-1089 (2025) W46-47,TRUE,"Winter Warmers (soups, stews, curry)" (2025) W43-44,TRUE,The Office (2025) W40-45,TRUE,"Adding Hello, Steak and No extra cost to 1017 & 1025" (2025) W39-46,TRUE,Fall Flavours -- picking some fall-themed recipes to be tagged (2025) W38-40,TRUE,Global Cuisine (manually check mark col. AR for W38-40) -min 5 / week (2025) W36+,TRUE,1043 to health surcharge (2025) W36-39,TRUE,Cat & Nat partnership [please tag the recipes here] (2025) W34+,TRUE,Health Product Line: 1085 to 1094 [Slack] (2025) W20-35,TRUE,SUMMER (up to W35) (2025) W18+,TRUE,"One pot / One Pan / Sheet pan: Quick & New tags| One Pot, One Pan and Sheet Pan labels" (2025) W18-22,TRUE,Taco Fiesta (2025) W14-17,TRUE,Earth Month (2025) W10+,TRUE,feel-good no longer needed. Must update Protein Plus label logic to be TAG logic. Reach out to Naomi Harper if unsure (2025) W10-13,TRUE,Family Table (2025) W10-12,TRUE,Sugar Shack (2025) W09,TRUE,Adjust the template to incl the additional static bestsellers (2025) W08-09,TRUE,"Filter on dish type for things like soup, chowder, bowl, curry... and add tag dinner-bowls" (2025) W01-05,TRUE,"Wellness recipes = all Carb Smart, Cal Smart and Protein Plus recipes, checkmark all the recipes in the sheet highlighted for protein plus manually (feel-good)" (2025) W01-04,TRUE,One pot / One Pan tag (2024) W48-52,TRUE,1045: Best of 2024 (2024) W45+,TRUE,Monthly Themes (3 parent slots) (2024) W44+,TRUE,Big Batch & Tenderloin MOD national (2024) W44-49,TRUE,1017 Perfect Pair label (2024) W41+,TRUE,1301 & 1302 as AB & BC only surcharges (2024) W41-42,TRUE,apply thanksgiving tag for reporting to TG slots (2024) W36,TRUE,3 new slots for 15MM (2024) W36,TRUE,Static Favourites (10 parent slots) (2024) W27+,TRUE,ON only MOD (beef tenderloin) (2024) W26,TRUE,"15MM slots returning > ""Super Quick"" label" "Notes: if keto meals come back, they must be tagged as carb-smart as well as have the keto label",, PLEASE REMEMBER TO COPY AND PASTE VALUES OF T+0 OR T+1 TAB TO LOCK IN DATA,, ============================================================ ## EMAIL CONTENTS ============================================================ ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúIan:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù Dec 19, 2025 ID: 19b376a7e728abb0 From: Gemini ---------------------------------------- Notes from ‚ÄúIan:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization. Open meeting notes The content was auto-generated on December 19, 2025, 5:20 PM CET and may contain errors. Summary Nikita Gorshkov provided Samir and Allison with praise for the successful launch of the US factor form Shopify B2B store and discussed the technical requirements with Ian Brooks for replicating this store for a Canadian factor, including URL configuration and core infrastructure needs. They decided that the Canadian pilot should use static content and minimal initial integrations, estimating that the necessary work, including URL setup, some infrastructure, and basic tracking, would require one product resource and one engineering resource for about two weeks. Nikita Gorshkov suggested a B2B proof of concept with minimal integrations could cost less than $100k (USD) as a one-time charge from Anata, in addition to the $24,000 USD annual Shopify enterprise license fee, which Ian Brooks noted would significantly increase the pilot cost. Suggested next steps Nikita Gorshkov will prepare a decision tree with pros and cons to hash out the sequencing of the Creator platform versus the customer platform delivery during the January meeting. Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini Is the summary section in this email helpful? Not Useful Email Useful Email Google LLC, 1600 Ampitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA You have received this email because meeting artifacts were initiated in Google Meet. ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: A Task Awaits You: Job Requisition - Nikita Gorshkov ID: 19b376995fa47e83 From: "Workday@HelloFresh" ---------------------------------------- [No readable text content found] ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Firefox's manager just took over all of Mozilla ID: 19b37646581e366c From: Mindstream ---------------------------------------- ---------- Yes, you can yo-yo in space, and NASA already tried it. Back in 2012, astronaut Don Pettit brought a yo-yo to the ISS and pulled off a whole routine in microgravity. Turns out the tricks still work because yo-yos rely on angular momentum, not ‚Äúnot floating away,‚Äù as long as you keep the string tight. **What‚Äôs in store:** * **The browser** wars are back and Mozilla just picked a side. * **Merriam-Webster** just named the mess. * **Mindstream Picks: **TotalEnergies signs 21-year renewable power deal. * [**Go viral**](https://offers.hubspot.com/ai-powered-meme-marketing?utm_medium=email-media-newsletter&utm_source=mindstream&utm_campaign=owned&utm_term=2025-12-19&utm_content=native-ads)** **with AI memes? _Read Time: 4 minutes_ -------------------- ###### **AI BROWSERS ** ## [Firefox is done being quiet](https://www.theregister.com/2025/12/16/mozilla_corporation_new_ceo/) View image: (https://media.beehiiv.com/cdn-cgi/image/fit=scale-down,format=auto,onerror=redirect,quality=80/uploads/asset/file/7545f8db-21f4-4162-8440-646821768667/mindstreammg_Create_a_digital_illustration_in_a_clean_modern__9c47c7cf-3372-45f8-a032-cbe29d621e86_1.png?t=1765893055) Follow image link: (https://www.theregister.com/2025/12/16/mozilla_corporation_new_ceo/) Caption: Mozilla has [appointed](https://www.theregister.com/2025/12/16/mozilla_corporation_new_ceo/) Anthony Enzor-DeMeo as its new CEO, replacing Laura Chambers, who served as interim chief ** _‚Äúzoom needs to stick with what it does best - meetings and webinars. The heck with all the other stuff. They are adding complexity and things most users won't need or use.‚Äù _- **_wpwise_** _‚ÄúMeetings will always be meetings, but this AI upgrade can actually help us to make even the most ‚Äúyawn-inducing‚Äù meetings productive by ensuring timely follow up. Plus, if we can easily review the effectiveness of various meetings, perhaps we can make these meetings more useful.‚Äù -_**_ Walter D_** _‚ÄúThis could have been an email.‚Äù _**_- hustleai_** Submit your opinions in our polls to be featured! ----------**AI or real? **_The image was‚Ä¶_** REAL** **#933.** And still, it keeps coming every single day! ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî ‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî You are reading a plain text version of this post. For the best experience, copy and paste this link in your browser to view the post online: https://www.mindstream.news/p/mozilla-takes-a-big-step-up ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúLaurent:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù Dec 19, 2025 ID: 19b375a784250099 From: Gemini ---------------------------------------- Notes from ‚ÄúLaurent:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization. Open meeting notes The content was auto-generated on December 19, 2025, 5:02 PM CET and may contain errors. Summary Laurent Guillemain introduced the one-year conversion rate program with multiple time-boxed initiatives aimed at achieving 2026 OKRs, with Dovas Zakas detailing the objective of a 25% year-on-year CVR improvement, focusing on dependable channels for tracking. Nikita Gorshkov emphasized a six-week short-term cadence for impetus, while Laurent Guillemain confirmed achievements would be measured through the quantifiable impact of delivered initiatives and a monthly ramp aligned with the OKR. Dovas Zakas, Laurent Guillemain, and Nikita Gorshkov agreed that Pratik would manage the conversion rate program for the first six months, focusing on initiatives across six pillars, with 20% of their time allocated to CVR and 20-30% to retention, requiring a technical owner from the engineering team to support them. Suggested next steps Nikita Gorshkov will have a discussion with Aron on Monday to figure out the actual capacity available. Dovas Zakas will try to make the CVR tracking a bit more fair by looking at meta native or one of the search channels and track the 25% uplift on those channels. Dovas Zakas will focus on the first draft of the tier co for the CVR program and make a monthly ramp to get to the goals. Nikita Gorshkov will get back with the name of the technical owner for the CVR program. Nikita Gorshkov will keep Dovas Zakas posted regarding the candidate for the analytics resource position. Laurent Guillemain and Dovas Zakas will align offline on the content of slide three and slide six for the CVR program. Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini Is the summary section in this email helpful? Not Useful Email Useful Email Google LLC, 1600 Ampitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA You have received this email because meeting artifacts were initiated in Google Meet. ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: 1. Anzahlungsrechnung f√ºr Ihr Firmenevent, 27.01.2026 (AN-68.863) ID: 19b37372bf78d0ed From: "Laura Sniegowski | FARO-Gruppe" ---------------------------------------- [No readable text content found] ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Notes: ‚ÄúLaura:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù Dec 19, 2025 ID: 19b37348712973bb From: Gemini ---------------------------------------- Notes from ‚ÄúLaura:Nikita 1:1 (2w)‚Äù These notes have been sent to invited guests in your organization. Open meeting notes The content was auto-generated on December 19, 2025, 4:21 PM CET and may contain errors. Summary Laura Loughran welcomed Nikita Gorshkov back, and they discussed the recent Shopify launch, confirming that traffic strategy will be decided in January after analyzing conversion rates, and Nikita Gorshkov confirmed the OTP launch is still targeting the 5th, with a full end-to-end UAT scheduled for the 30th. Laura Loughran and Nikita Gorshkov raised concerns about the small team's capacity to manage both the new Shopify site and existing operations, agreeing that a dedicated Shopify team might be necessary to handle maintenance and questioning the future product ownership and strategy beyond basic maintenance, especially given team commitments like Samir and Alli (Allison) to other projects. Nikita Gorshkov also noted the team, including Hammed and Michael, is working on significantly improving the legacy integrated site, particularly the PDP pages. Suggested next steps Nikita Gorshkov will check Allison's schedule to confirm she will be available to support the Shopify site for the next couple of weeks. Meeting records Document Notes by Gemini Is the summary section in this email helpful? Not Useful Email Useful Email Google LLC, 1600 Ampitheatre Parkway, Mountain View, CA 94043, USA You have received this email because meeting artifacts were initiated in Google Meet. ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Case HR-156455 moved to HFSE-PS-HQ-IT&Sec, MarT, TAM, SCM, NoAll, GOAT, FoodS.,Act.J Service Team ID: 19b3733c3c608ad5 From: "Workday@HelloFresh" ---------------------------------------- [No readable text content found] ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Re: [HelloTech Launch Announcement] Global Chatbot rollout ID: 19b3730fe55e3cd5 From: Tilman Eichstaedt ---------------------------------------- [No readable text content found] ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: Your Navan login link ID: 19b37294f0e54e1d From: Navan ---------------------------------------- < "> ---------------------------------------- ### EMAIL: You have a new trip proposal to review, HelloFresh CA Trip ID: 19b37274957edee6 From: Navan ---------------------------------------- You have a new trip proposal to review, HelloFresh CA Trip
